message:
Reminder: Deadline for job opportunity is in one week.
Job Opportunity Summary:
Title: Software Developer -
Company: NextGen
Solutions, Software, JavaScript, AWS
Location: Seattle, Seattle, Python
Deadline: 2025-04-15
Salary: $100,000
Type: Full-time
Apply Here: https://nextgensolutions.com/careers/software-developer

Details: Software Developer position based in Seattle, WA. Salary between $100,000-$110,000 per year, depending on experience. Candidates should have strong skills in Python, JavaScript, and cloud technologies (e.g., AWS). Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus.
